# TagCollection.Remove method

Remove a tag with a given index.

```csharp
public bool Remove(TagDef tag)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| tag | Definition of tag to remove. |

## Return Value

`true` if the tag was sucessfully removed from the collection.
